repos.name: automated_development
repos.description: Run Prompts Control – Tauri + Next.js app to run prompts across projects (script/run_prompts_all_projects.sh). Dashboard, tickets, features, AI ticket generation.
repos.entrypoint: npm run dev (port 4000), npm run tauri dev

repos.name: KW-February-AIAdventureGame
repos.description: AI-powered adventure game with Python backend (FastAPI) and frontend (React/TypeScript). RAG, embeddings, OpenAI, WebSockets.

repos.name: KW-February-AIISO
repos.description: Monorepo with 10 deployable apps and shared code. Single Next.js hub on port 4000; each app at /<app-name>. Apps built with React + Vite.

repos.name: KW-February-AITrello
repos.description: OrganizeAI – Trello-like / project management app. Next.js app in organizeai/ with boards, drag-and-drop, calendar, AI, SQLite.

repos.name: KW-February-CasaPetrada
repos.description: CASA-PETRADA MODE & ACCESSOIRES – E-commerce website. Vue 3 + Vite, Stripe.

repos.name: KW-February-Karaweissorg
repos.description: HTMX showcase app for shared components, functions, and animations. Express server, server-rendered with Tailwind.
repos.entrypoint: Frontend in frontend/; dev: PORT=3001 tsx watch src/server/index.ts

repos.name: KW-February-PetraOld
repos.description: Legacy static site – HTML, CSS, images (JPG/PNG). No framework; assets in assets/ and public/.
repos.entrypoint: Static files only; serve via any HTTP server

repos.name: KW-February-PetraProducts
repos.description: Product display website – shows products from CSV (Shopify export). Search, filter, responsive; German UI. Backend with SQLite.
repos.entrypoint: npm run dev (Vite), npm run dev:server (Express); npm start

repos.name: KW-February-Saas
repos.description: Vereins-Manager – SaaS for German clubs: QR check-in, members, contributions. Next.js, Supabase, Clerk.

repos.name: KW-February-Soladia
repos.description: Solana wallet / Web3 app. Next.js, Solana wallet adapters, Anchor (Solana programs), Storybook.
repos.entrypoint: npm run dev (default or dev:3003); anchor build / anchor test

repos.name: KW-February-ThreeJS
repos.description: React Three Fiber / Three.js – 3D Next.js app. PWA, GLSL, three-stdlib.

repos.name: KW-February-VideoLinkTranscription
repos.description: Video link transcription – paste YouTube/Instagram/Facebook links; get transcriptions and optional AI summaries. yt-dlp + Whisper via Python FastAPI service.
repos.entrypoint: Transcribe: cd transcribe-service && uvicorn main:app --port 8000; App: npm run dev

repos.name: viralsync.io
repos.description: ViralSync – AI-powered social media management platform. Multi-platform (Instagram, Facebook, YouTube, TikTok), AI content creation, agents, Mastra, Drizzle, Cloudflare workers.
repos.entrypoint: pnpm dev; full stack: pnpm dev:full

repos.name: ZekiMusic
repos.description: Contains Audiveris (Java/Gradle – OMR, PDF to MusicXML) and KW-February-ZekiMusic (Python). Music notation / OMR tooling.
